HeroGame

Class BattleScreen

  • java.lang.Object
    • HeroGame.BattleScreen

  • public class BattleScreen
extends java.lang.Object
    BattleScreen Class for Heroes & Villains Game SENG201 2018S1
    Author:
    Andy Holden & Alex Liggett

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BattleScreen(Hero player, City city, Team team, GameManager incomingManager, Direction direction)
      Create the application.

      Sets damage values for player and villain, updates screen.

      Close the window when required

      Dice rolls battle game.

      Externally callable method to close screen and return to game state manager

      Gamble the Team's reward on the pokies to either double it or lose it

      Guess a number battle game Player guesses a number between 1 & 10 (per game specification) Villain says "higher" or "lower".

      Creates a new game when the 'Play Again' button is clicked

      Randomly allocate a game to play

      Randomly generates the team's cash reward for finishing the Villain, and gives the option to gamble for more

                    City city,

        Create the application.

    • Method Detail

      • paperScissorsRock

        public void paperScissorsRock()
        Rock paper scissors battle game decision mechanics As per tradition, rock beats scissors, paper beats rock, scissors beat paper. No lizard or spock implemented at this stage.

      • guessNumber

        public void guessNumber()
        Guess a number battle game Player guesses a number between 1 & 10 (per game specification) Villain says "higher" or "lower". Two further attempts allowed (per game specification)

      • diceRolls

        public void diceRolls()
        Dice rolls battle game. Player rolls a six sided dice Then baddie rolls, and the game is decided on the highest roll

      • battleConsequence

        public void battleConsequence(java.lang.String result)
        Sets damage values for player and villain, updates screen. Brings up a warning and collapses screen when either protagonist dies

      • rewards

        public void rewards()
        Randomly generates the team's cash reward for finishing the Villain, and gives the option to gamble for more

      • gamble

        public int gamble(int reward)
        Gamble the Team's reward on the pokies to either double it or lose it
        Parameters:
        reward - an int the amount the Team received from the townsfolk
        Returns:
        an int How much money the Team gets back from gambling

      • newGame

        public void newGame(Hero hero,
                    City city,
                    Team team)
        Creates a new game when the 'Play Again' button is clicked
        Parameters:
        hero - a Hero the hero passed into the original constructor
        villain - a Villain the villain passed into the original constructor
        team - a Team the team passed into the original constructor

      • randomGame

        public java.lang.String randomGame()
        Randomly allocate a game to play
        Returns:
        a String from the gameType list. {"PaperScissorsRock", "GuessNumber", "RollDice"}

      • closeScreen

        public void closeScreen()
        Close the window when required

      • finishedBattleScreen

        public void finishedBattleScreen()
        Externally callable method to close screen and return to game state manager
